description:
Giselle`s Cubone was sent out to battle Ash her after he got angry at Giselle for her demeaning attitude towards him and challenged her.
Cubone used a `Bonemerang` attack against Pikachu and Ash exclaimed that it was cheating to use projectile items. Giselle quickly responded by saying that it was legitimate move authorized by the Pok√©mon League.
Pikachu managed to defeat her Cubone without using any Electric moves. Giselle was very surprised with Pikachu`s victory because it wasn`t in any textbooks or reference books that she had studied.
name: Karakara (Seiyo)
